    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void checkForValidMessage()
    checkForValidMessage() Method checks whether the chat message is empty and sets the ability to press the send button accordingly.
    void chooseUserName​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    chooseUserName(ActionEvent) Action Event which gets launched after Pressing btn_ChooseUserName.
    void closeChat​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    closeChat(MouseEvent) MouseEvent method which deactivates the grid_Chat Layer of the StackPane by pressing the btn_GoBack
    java.lang.String getNextScene()  
    ViewHandler getViewHandler()  
    void init​(GameStartViewModel gameStartViewModel, ViewHandler viewHandler)
    Method initializes the variables and binds it to according GameStartViewModel variables.
    void lockRobotButtons()
    lockRobotButtons() This method locks the Robot Buttons of GUI, so that player can't select different robot after submitting his selections.
    void openChat​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    openChat(MouseEvent) MouseEvent method which activates the grid_Chat Layer of the StackPane by pressing the btn_OpenChat
    void resetButtonText()
    resetButtonText() This method gets called to change the Text of the Robot Buttons back to Available after changing the selection of the robot.
    void selectHammerBot​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    selectHammerBot(ActionEvent) Action Event which gets launched after choosing HammerBot after pressing btn_HammerBot.
    void selectHulkX90​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    selectHulkX90(ActionEvent) Action Event which gets launched after choosing HulkX90 after pressing btn_HulkX90.
    void selectSmashBot​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    selectSmashBot(ActionEvent) Action Event which gets launched after choosing SmashBot after pressing btn_SmashBot.
    void selectSpinBot​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    selectSpinBot(ActionEvent) Action Event which gets launched after choosing SpinBot after pressing btn_SpinBot.
    void selectTwonky​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    selectTwonky(ActionEvent) Action Event which gets launched after choosing Twonky after pressing btn_Twonky.
    void selectZoomBot​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    selectZoomBot(ActionEvent) Action Event which gets launched after choosing ZoomBot after pressing btn_ZoomBot.
    void sendChat​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    sendChat(MouseEvent) Method sends the chat message to selected other players by calling according GameStartViewModel method with relevant parameters
    void showReadiness​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    showReadiness(MouseEvent) Mouse Event which either: - Submits the Clients selections of Robot and Username and manipulates the GUI accordingly - Signals in the end to the Server, that Client is ready to play
    void submitPlayerValues()
    submitPlayerValues() This method submits the PlayerValues to the Server through MVVM Pattern.
    void submitRacingCourse​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    submitRacingCourse(MouseEvent) MouseEvent which submits the chosen RacingCourse to the server.

    • showReadiness

      public void showReadiness​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      showReadiness(MouseEvent) Mouse Event which either: - Submits the Clients selections of Robot and Username and manipulates the GUI accordingly - Signals in the end to the Server, that Client is ready to play

      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • submitPlayerValues

      public void submitPlayerValues()
      submitPlayerValues() This method submits the PlayerValues to the Server through MVVM Pattern. Gets called by showReadiness event

    • lockRobotButtons

      public void lockRobotButtons()
      lockRobotButtons() This method locks the Robot Buttons of GUI, so that player can't select different robot after submitting his selections. Gets called by showReadiness event
